testcase.classname: F00_Registration | User could register with valid data
testcase.name: User Successful Registration
testcase.system-out: Given User go to registration page..........................................passed When User enter the user data...............................................passed And User click register button..............................................passed Then User Register Successfully.............................................passed

testcase.classname: F01_Login | Users could use login functionality to open their accounts with valid credentials
testcase.name: user should be able to login with valid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given User go to login page.................................................passed When User enter valid user data with valid@example.com and P@ssw0rd.........passed And User click login button.................................................passed Then User login successfully................................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_ForgetPassword | User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: user should be able to reset password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to login page...............................................passed When User click on forget password button...................................passed And User enter valid user email.............................................passed And User click recover button...............................................passed Then User recover password successfully.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Search | Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: user could search for product using fullname
testcase.system-out: Given Logged-in user........................................................passed When User clicks on search field............................................passed And User search with name of product........................................passed Then User could find relative results.......................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_ChangeCurrency | User could change currency successfully
testcase.name: User change currency successfully
testcase.system-out: Given Logged user...........................................................passed When User Change currency from currency menu................................passed Then Currency changes successfully..........................................passed

testcase.classname: F05_ProductHover | User could choose different categories
testcase.name: User could choose different categories
testcase.system-out: Given Log user..............................................................passed When User Choose different category.........................................passed Then Category page open successfully........................................passed And Sub-category page open successfully.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F06_FilterColor | User could filter product with color
testcase.name: User could filter shoes by colors
testcase.system-out: Given The Logged user.......................................................passed When User Choose shoes category.............................................passed And User Choose blue color shoes............................................passed Then Required product color appears successfully............................passed

testcase.classname: F07_SelectTag | Logged user could select different tags
testcase.name: User could select different tags

testcase.classname: F08_AddToCart | Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.name: User add different products to cart
testcase.system-out: Given User log..............................................................passed When User click on product tabs.............................................passed And User click on required product..........................................passed And User click on add to cart...............................................passed Then Related products added successfully....................................passed

testcase.classname: F09_AddToWishList | Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.name: User add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given User logs.............................................................passed When User clicks on product tabs............................................passed And User clicks on required product.........................................passed And User click on add to wishlist...........................................passed Then Related product added successfully.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F10_AddToCompareList | Logged user could add different products to compare list
testcase.name: User add different products to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given logged user...........................................................passed When user click on product tabs.............................................passed And user click on required product..........................................passed And User click on add to compare list.......................................passed Then related products added successfully....................................passed

testcase.name: User add different products to cart
